__e: Yeah, karma is the ultimate bitch in this one.
I hate to say it, but, karma's a bitch.
Yesterday, I get mugged, and now I can't even get a taxi - and I can always get a taxi.
The only bad thing about him is he cares about family and karma and all that crap.
I'm a firm believer in karma. And I think this situation was attracted into my life as a huge learning lesson for me... to grow and expand as a spiritual human being.
If there's any karma in all this, he's probably happier than you are.
